event.title: MageAnts Magento 2 Shipping Table Rates
event.description:
Magento 2 Shipping Table Rates assists you by providing various shipping choices by specifying different transport prices based on product cost, product volume, the weight of this item, as well as the delivery destination.

Key Features

· Importing table Prices or editing them manually

· Displaying all of the remarks and the pictures on goods Together with check
out pages

· Generation of table prices in bulk

Summary

For handling the delivery procedure and calculating the delivery cost one needs to construct a flexible system of their table prices. Together with the Magento 2 shipping table rates extension, an individual can create various shipping methods with percentage rates based on the shipping address, the number of this merchandise and the cart
burden.
